title: Chest Awarding System

embed.description: Jihadi Eclipse / Silver 3 0LP / 261W 260L Win Ratio 50% / Yasuo - 47W 37L Win Ratio 56%, Zed - 40W 36L Win Ratio 53%, Nasus - 32W 22L Win Ratio 59%, Shen - 10W 12L Win Ratio 45%, Kayn - 9W 11L Win Ratio 45%

body:
I got a S on Sion. But I don't get a chest?
Someone please explain this to me.

replies.body:
* Did you have chests available? - Check by the chest icon under your name in the profile tab
* Have you already received a chest for Sion this season (preseason still counts as season 7 for this) - Check in your champions tab if sion has a yellow border around him.
It doesn't have the border. It still says naught. Just season best is "S"
